content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, or to taste (optional)
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, or to taste (optional)" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, stir together the avocados, lime juice, orange juice, pineapple juice, cumin, cilantro and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "stir"@20:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the avocados"@34:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "lime juice"@48:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "orange juice"@60:72 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pineapple juice"@74:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cumin"@91:96 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cilantro"@98:106 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@111:115 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Mix in hot pepper sauce if using.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "hot pepper sauce"@10:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:todo ( cond-1-0 "if using"@27:35 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place one of the avocado pits into the bowl to help keep it fresh.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "one of the avocado pits"@9:32 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "the bowl"@38:46 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "to help keep it fresh"@47:68 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving.
